text:
Hi Atul,
Not a 100% sure, but <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/hubdb|HubDB> is probably what you need. Look at this project to confirm if this helps <https://github.com/katelynae/HubDB-Resource-Library/>
Hey <@U01RJ0UQ9JR>, we were able to put a fix in for this, it _should_ be working as you would expect now, but let me know if you see anything off!
Hi guys i am having some problems with a theme, I cloned a page to the child theme but the changes wont apply, any insight? Thank you!
